review: The Fire stick is so easy, so intuitive to set up that even a technophobe can do it.  Now I don't know how got along with out it.  Wednesday is movie night at our house. I used to move my 17" Dell laptop over to the TV and start-up Netflix, Amazon, or Hulu to select the evening program.  With Fire Stick  it's always movie night and I am seriously considering dropping the Satellite service and saving $95 bucks a month.If you've been thinking about it, just go ahead and do this!  It is definitely worth the time and money,
